title: 2bd 2ba, Gas log fireplace, State-of-the-art fitness center
posting_body: Verona Apartments offers the utmost in Henderson living with one, two, and three bedroom apartments.
You will enjoy the renovated redesigned interiors and life-enhancing upgrades around the property.
Wood-style plank flooring, spacious floor plans, and in-home laundry options are just a few apartment features you'll love.

Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas-Polished granite kitchen countertops-Stainless steel appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Built-in desk-Gas log fireplace-Oversized walk-in closets-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Breakfast bar and built-in wine rack-Vaulted ceilings*-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity

State-of-the-art fitness center-Controlled-entry access with reserved covered parking and private attached garages available                                                                                         Featured amenity-Built to Green Globes Building Certification-Resident social lounge with billiards table and shuffleboard table                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Poolside green space with recreational games-Easy access to SR-582 and Interstate 515-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:

Only a small one-time payment-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-Virtual moving concierge – Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi
